name: Genesect EX
author: Eske Yoshinob

abilities.name: Drive Change
abilities.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may return a Pokémon Tool card attached to this Pokémon to your hand.

attacks.name: Rapid Blaster
attacks.effect: Discard as many {M} Energy attached to this Pokémon as you like. This attack does 20 more damage for each {M} Energy you discarded.

rule_box: When a Pokémon-EX has been Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.
